        ) {
            Class[] types = new Class [] {
                java.lang.String.class, java.lang.String.class, java.lang.String.class, java.lang.String.class
            };
            boolean[] canEdit = new boolean [] {
                false, false, true, true
            };

            public Class getColumnClass(int columnIndex) {
                return types [columnIndex];
            }

            public boolean isCellEditable(int rowIndex, int columnIndex) {
                return canEdit [columnIndex];
            }
        });

    private void btnAddActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                       
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        if (txtId.getText().equals("") || txtName.getText().equals("") || txtBirthday.getText().equals("") || txtAge.getText().equals("")) {
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Please join values ");
        } else {
            try {
                Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
                Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:orcl", "MINHND", "MINHND");
                PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO STUDENTS VALUES(?,?,?,?)");
                ps.setInt(1, Integer.parseInt(txtId.getText()));
                ps.setString(2, txtName.getText());
                ps.setString(3, txtBirthday.getText());
                ps.setInt(4, Integer.parseInt(txtAge.getText()));
                ps.executeUpdate();
                dtm = (DefaultTableModel) tblStudents.getModel();
                dtm.addRow(new Object[]{txtId.getText(), txtName.getText(), txtBirthday.getText(), txtAge.getText()});
                conn.close();
                ps.close();
                System.out.println("Insert Successful!");

            } catch (Exception e) {
                System.out.println(e.getMessage());
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }                                      

    private void txtUpdateActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        
        String updateSQL = "UPDATE STUDENTS SET STUDENT_NAME = ?,STUDENT_BIRTHDAY =? STUNDENT_AGE = ?, WHERE ID = ?";
        try {
            Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
            Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:orcl", "MINHND", "MINHND");
            PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement("UPDATE STUDENTS SET STUDENT_NAME = ?,STUDENT_BIRTHDAY =? STUNDENT_AGE = ?, WHERE ID = ?");
            
            if(tblStudents.getSelectedRow()== -1){
              if(tblStudents.getRowCount() == 0){
              JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Table is Empty");
              }else{
              JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "You must select anyRow");
              }
            }else{
            dtm = (DefaultTableModel) tblStudents.getModel();
            dtm.setValueAt(txtId.getText(), tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 0);
            dtm.setValueAt(txtName.getText(), tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 1);
            dtm.setValueAt(txtBirthday.getText(), tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 2);
            dtm.setValueAt(txtAge.getText(), tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 3);
            
            System.out.println("Update Successful!");}

        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.println(e.getMessage());
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }                                         

    private void tblStudentsMouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {                                         
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        dtm = (DefaultTableModel) tblStudents.getModel();
        txtId.setText(dtm.getValueAt(tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 0).toString());
        txtName.setText(dtm.getValueAt(tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 1).toString());
        txtBirthday.setText(dtm.getValueAt(tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 2).toString());
        txtAge.setText(dtm.getValueAt(tblStudents.getSelectedRow(), 3).toString());
        txtId.requestFocus();
    }                                        

    private void txtDeleteActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        dtm = (DefaultTableModel) tblStudents.getModel();
        if (tblStudents.getSelectedRow()==-1) {
            if (tblStudents.getRowCount()==0) {
                System.out.println("fail!");
            }
            else{
                System.out.println("You must select anyrow");
            }
        }
        else{
            dtm.removeRow(tblStudents.getSelectedRow());
            txtId.setText("");
            txtName.setText("");
            txtBirthday.setText("");
            txtAge.setText("");
            txtId.requestFocus();
        }
    }                                         

    private void txtFindActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        
        try {
            Class.forName("oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver");
            Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:orcl", "MINHND", "MINHND");
            Vector row, colum;
            colum = new Vector();
            DefaultTableModel dtm = new DefaultTableModel();
            int numrow;
            Statement sta = conn.createStatement();
            ResultSet result = sta.executeQuery("Select * from  STUDENTS");
            ResultSetMetaData resultset = result.getMetaData();
            numrow = resultset.getColumnCount();
            for (int i = 1; i <= numrow; i++) {
                colum.add(resultset.getColumnName(i));
            }
            
            dtm.setColumnIdentifiers(colum);
            while (result.next()) {                
                row = new Vector();
                for (int i = 1; i <= numrow; i++) {
                    row.add(result.getString(i));
                    
                }
                dtm.addRow(row);
            }
            
            tblStudents.setModel(dtm);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments

            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(QuanLySinhVien.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);

        //</editor-fold>

        /* Create and display the form */
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new QuanLySinhVien().setVisible(true);

        });
        
       
    }
